statements: SELECT * FROM attendees;
SELECT attendee_id, first_name, last_name FROM attendees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM attendees;
SELECT * FROM attendees WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM attendees ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendees WHERE first_name = 'Alice';
SELECT last_name, email FROM attendees WHERE attendee_id > 10 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM attendees WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM attendees WHERE last_name = 'Smith' OR last_name = 'Johnson';
SELECT attendee_id, first_name, email FROM attendees WHERE last_name <> 'Doe' ORDER BY attendee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendees;
SELECT name, email FROM attendees WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT session_name, location, session_date FROM sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT session_name, start_time, end_time FROM sessions WHERE location = 'Room 101';
SELECT name, email FROM attendees ORDER BY name ASC, email DESC;
SELECT attendee_id, name, email FROM attendees WHERE registration_date = '2022-05-23';
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE session_date >= '2022-06-15' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT attendee_id, name, email, registration_date FROM attendees WHERE name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT session_id, session_name, session_date, start_time, end_time, location FROM sessions WHERE location = 'Conference Room A' AND session_date > '2022-07-01';
SELECT attendee_id, name, email, registration_date FROM attendees JOIN sessions ON attendees.attendee_id = sessions.session_id WHERE session_date = '2022-08-10';
SELECT * FROM attendee_registrations;
SELECT attendee_name, event_id FROM attendee_registrations ORDER BY attendee_name DESC;
SELECT session_name, start_time, end_time FROM session_schedules WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT attendee_name, session_name, satisfaction_level FROM attendee_registrations JOIN feedback_surveys ON attendee_registrations.attendee_id = feedback_surveys.attendee_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback_surveys WHERE satisfaction_level > 3 ORDER BY session_id DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, event_id FROM attendee_registrations WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT session_name, start_time, end_time FROM session_schedules WHERE event_id = 5 ORDER BY start_time DESC;

SELECT attendee_name, session_name, satisfaction_level FROM attendee_registrations ar JOIN feedback_surveys fs ON ar.attendee_id = fs.attendee_id JOIN session_schedules ss ON fs.session_id = ss.session_id WHERE ar.event_id = 2 ORDER BY satisfaction_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_surveys WHERE satisfaction_level > 3 AND comments IS NOT NULL;

SELECT ar.attendee_name, ss.session_name, fs.satisfaction_level FROM attendee_registrations ar LEFT JOIN session_schedules ss ON ar.event_id = ss.event_id LEFT JOIN feedback_surveys fs ON ar.attendee_id = fs.attendee_id AND ss.session_id = fs.session_id;
SELECT * FROM Attendees;
SELECT name, email FROM Attendees WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Sessions ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT session_name, start_time, end_time FROM Sessions WHERE session_id = 2;
SELECT registration_id, rating, comments FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY registration_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Attendees;
SELECT attendee_id, name FROM Attendees ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT session_name, start_time, end_time FROM Sessions WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';

SELECT Attendees.name, Sessions.session_name, Registrations.registration_date FROM Registrations JOIN Attendees ON Registrations.attendee_id = Attendees.attendee_id JOIN Sessions ON Registrations.session_id = Sessions.session_id;

SELECT name, rating, comments FROM Attendees JOIN Registrations ON Attendees.attendee_id = Registrations.attendee_id JOIN Feedback ON Registrations.registration_id = Feedback.registration_id WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM organizers;
SELECT name, email FROM attendees WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT session_id, session_name, start_time, end_time FROM sessions WHERE start_time < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY end_time DESC;
SELECT attendee_id, full_name, email FROM attendees WHERE full_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY full_name;

SELECT session_id, session_name, COUNT(registration_id) AS total_registrations FROM sessions LEFT JOIN registrations ON sessions.session_id = registrations.session_id GROUP BY session_id ORDER BY total_registrations DESC;
SELECT * FROM organizers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT session_name, start_time, end_time FROM sessions WHERE start_time > '2021-01-01' AND end_time < '2021-12-31';
SELECT full_name, email FROM attendees WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT feedback, rating FROM feedback_surveys WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;

SELECT o.name AS organizer_name, s.session_name, a.full_name AS attendee_name, r.registration_date FROM organizers o JOIN sessions s ON o.id = s.session_id JOIN registrations r ON r.session_id = s.session_id JOIN attendees a ON r.attendee_id = a.attendee_id WHERE r.registration_date < '2022-08-31';
